Intervention: Reminder of the family doctor's letter
Eligibility: Active family physicians (family physicians, general practitioners or front-line doctors) who have women who are lagging behind in their practice and who meet the following criteria:
Previously enrolled in the BCPMS and undergoing previous normal screening mammography.
Have agreed to be contacted for research on the SMPBC questionnaire
6-24 months late from their last screening mammography
Have registered an active family physician as a contact to receive their mammography results
Family physicians who do not work in primary care
Family doctors who do not have women who are lagging behind in their practice
Results: Percentage of women who are late returning for mammography screening
Percentage of women who are late returning for screening mammography, measured from the date of randomization
Unit of measure: percentage of participants 24.0
Title of the arm/group: Family doctor's recall
Unit of measure: percentage of participants 34.4
